title: 1895 N300 Mayo Cut Plug  50 For Sale at National
author: Donscards

posts.post_title: 1895 N300 Mayo Cut Plug  50 For Sale at National
posts.post_content: I will have 50 1895 N300 Mayo Cut Plug Baseball at the National---Table 2045--Stars and Commons--Including Anson,Delehanty,Clarkson,Brothers,Ewing,McCarthy, Robinson,Russie,Ward and others---All Graded by SGC with grades ranging from 10 to 60--with a SGC 60 Kid Nichols and a SGC 60 Russie----thanks, Don Hontz

Im not ging tothe Nat'l bu I m interested in Mayos Whos do you have and @ what codition/price..
PLMK
Brian

Brian---I am packed and ready to go---leaving tomorrow morning---I have over 50 Mayo's   all graded sgc  from 10 to 60----I have most of the cards---but I certainly hope to sell many at the show----my prices are right at the going rate---I have sold a few to members on here and everyone is happy.--but your best bet is to give me a wantlist and when I get back, I can see if I have any from your list.   thanks,  Don
